Is there anything you think is missing from this web site?
Respondent ID Comment
1 N/A
2 no
3 Nothing. I think this website is good.
4 There should a department button in the navigation bar to find the list of all departments.
5 From first page, it gave me hard time to find the school that I am interested.
6 Information in the top bar is kind of confusing. It is hard to say what's the difference between study, research and industry. Finding real and useful information for prospective students is hard.
7 deadlines and professors in department, to find these we have to look elsewhere.
8 nothing in particular
9 nothing.
10 I am not sure whether it's a problem with me or the site. I am not accustomed to search for university info depending entirely on webpages. For example, if I want to find the deadline, I would search in google about the deadline before even going to the university website. So, my recommendation is to consider that fact in your report. I am too dependent on google I guess.

How to read the table

The table on this page displays actual unedited comments each respondent made to the open question. If blank, no comment was made. The best way of looking at them is to read the comments and notice themes which occur regularly.


Content Analysis service at WAMMI.COM

WAMMI provides a popular additional service where respondents comments are sorted into a mangeable number of categories and presented according to percentage distribution and global usability scores. Examples of comments for each category are given in a written report. Please contact us for information about our Content Analysis Service.
